Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1968...
Injured on 5/6/1968 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/24/1968 with a Broken Elbow, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Minnesota to St. Louis on 7/23/1971 (Going to STL: P G. Zahn. Going to MIN: P V. McDaniel)...
Earned first career win on 5/24/1972...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/29/1972, off Chuck Nieson (PHI)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1972...
Injured on 6/3/1975 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/6/1978 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Traded from New York (N) to Cleveland on 7/21/1978 (Going to NYM: RF L. Herndon. Going to CLE: C R. Hodges, SS D. Cripe, P G. Zahn)...
Traded from Cleveland to Texas on 7/31/1981 (Going to TEX: 2B C. Walker, P E. Vande Berg, P S. Bahnsen, P G. Zahn. Going to CLE: CF L. Hisle, 3B K. Oberkfell)...
Released by Texas on 7/31/1981...
